rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming open space with traditional Kerala motifs and natural light through ceiling windows.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows facing the West, maximizing natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: A well-sized dining room integrated with the living area, featuring a traditional Kerala-style open plan.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A functional kitchen with integrated appliances, designed in a traditional Kerala style using natural materials.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows for ample light, incorporating Vastu-compliant positioning.

rooms.name: Child Bedroom
rooms.description: A cozy bedroom designed for comfort and adherence to Vastu, ensuring a harmonious energy flow.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A bathroom with traditional Kerala tiles and fixtures designed for both utility and aesthetics.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A wide doorway leading from the entrance hall to a small foyer, designed with traditional Kerala woodwork.

openings.name: Front Door
openings.description: An elegantly carved front door featuring traditional motifs in keeping with Vastu principles.

openings.name: Back Door
openings.description: A service entrance that connects to the kitchen and utility areas.
